eski bir oyun olmasına rağmen aşırı zevk veriyor. bazen beyniniz ağırabilir bu odadan nasıl çıkıcaz amq diyebilirsiniz ama en sonunda seve seve o çıkışı buluyorsunuz. indirimdeyken almanızı öneririm. oyunda türkçe altyazı var 5ten itibaren ihtiyacınız olacaktır çünkü oyun apayrı bir yere geçiyor ve merak uyandırıyor...

I really like games where you have to think in order to solve the game. It's really awesome when you manage to get out of the level without making any mistakes. I also really like the co-op maps and custom maps. It's a really fun game to play with friends or alone. I would absolutely suggest the game to everyone who also likes these types of genres.
A great Puzzle game and the story mode is fun with many jokes :D
How don't you own this game already? BUY IT!

This was my first PC game back in the day, and even now it's one of my favorites ever. Charming writing and clever design, definitely a great time.
(thanks to my brother for buying a graphics card after I got the game so I would be able to run it)
(also low playtime thanks to fresh acct)
